mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DS_MSTR( DS_ID, DS_NM, DB_NM, IP, USER_ID, PASSWD, PORT, DBMS_TYPE, OWNER_NM, DS_DESC, DS_CONNSTR, REG_DT, REG_USER_NO, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_NO, RACIP, RACPORT, WF_YN, USER_AREA_YN, CONN_TYPE, HASH_YN ) VALUES( DS_MSTR_DS_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dsNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbmsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, #{connectorType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DS_MSTR WHERE DS_ID = #{dsId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
UPDATE DS_MSTR SET
DS_NM = #{dsNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_NM = #{dbNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DBMS_TYPE = #{dbmsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_NM = #{ownerNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONN_TYPE = #{connectorType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT = #{port, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HASH_YN = HASH_YN WHERE DS_ID = #{dsId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS DS_CUBE_ID, DS.DS_VIEW_ID, DS.DS_ID, CUBE.CUBE_ID, CUBE.DIM_UNI_NM, DS.DS_VIEW_NM, DS.DS_NM, DS.DBMS_TYPE, DS.OWNER_NM, DS.IP, DS.DB_NM, CUBE.CUBE_NM, CUBE.DIM_CAPTION FROM ( SELECT DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_VIEW_ID, DS_MSTR.DS_ID, DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_VIEW_NM, DS_MSTR.DS_NM, DS_MSTR.DBMS_TYPE, DS_MSTR.OWNER_NM, DS_MSTR.IP, DS_MSTR.DB_NM FROM DS_MSTR INNER JOIN DS_VIEW_MSTR ON DS_MSTR.DS_ID = DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_ID ORDER BY 2 DESC ) DS INNER JOIN ( SELECT CUBE_MSTR.DS_VIEW_ID, CUBE_MSTR.CUBE_ID, CUBE_MSTR.CUBE_NM, CUBE_DIM_MSTR.DIM_CAPTION, CUBE_DIM_MSTR.DIM_UNI_NM FROM CUBE_MSTR INNER JOIN CUBE_DIM_MSTR ON CUBE_MSTR.CUBE_ID = CUBE_DIM_MSTR.CUBE_ID ORDER BY 2 DESC ) CUBE ON DS.DS_VIEW_ID = CUBE.DS_VIEW_ID ORDER BY DS.DS_VIEW_ID, DS.DS_ID, CUBE.CUBE_ID

SELECT DS_MSTR.DS_ID, DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_VIEW_ID, DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_VIEW_NM, DS_MSTR.DS_NM, DS_MSTR.DBMS_TYPE, DS_MSTR.OWNER_NM, DS_MSTR.IP FROM DS_MSTR INNER JOIN DS_VIEW_MSTR ON DS_MSTR.DS_ID = DS_VIEW_MSTR.DS_ID

SELECT DS_MSTR.DS_ID, DS_MSTR.DS_NM, DS_MSTR.DB_NM, DS_MSTR.IP, DS_MSTR.USER_ID, DS_MSTR.PASSWD, DS_MSTR.PORT, DS_MSTR.DBMS_TYPE, DS_MSTR.OWNER_NM, DS_DESC, DS_MSTR.CONN_TYPE, DS_MSTR.USER_AREA_YN, DS_MSTR.HASH_YN, DS_MSTR.WF_YN FROM DS_MSTR

SELECT DS_MSTR.DS_ID AS DS_ID, DS_NM, DB_NM, IP, DS_MSTR.USER_ID AS USER_ID, PORT, DBMS_TYPE, OWNER_NM, DS_DESC, WF_YN, USER_AREA_YN from GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR INNER JOIN DS_MSTR ON DS_MSTR.DS_ID = GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR.DS_ID INNER JOIN USER_MSTR ON USER_MSTR.GRP_ID = GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR.GRP_ID WHERE USER_MSTR.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY DS_NM

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM DS_MSTR A JOIN USER_AUTH_DS_MSTR B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID JOIN DS_VIEW_MSTR C ON C.DS_ID = B.DS_ID WHERE USER_NO = (SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_MSTR WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND DEL_YN = 'N')

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM DS_MSTR A JOIN GRP_AUTH_DS_MSTR B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID JOIN DS_VIEW_MSTR C ON C.DS_ID = B.DS_ID WHERE GRP_ID = (SELECT GRP_ID FROM USER_MSTR WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND DEL_YN = 'N')
SELECT * FROM USER_UPLOAD_MSTR WHERE DS_ID = #{ds_id} ORDER BY DATA_SEQ
SELECT TBL_NM AS TBL_NM , TBL_CAPTION AS TBL_CAPTION FROM DS_VIEW_TBL_MSTR WHERE DS_VIEW_ID = #{dsView_id}
